name: Elementalz (ZachRad)
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to look

F to pick up cards

R to load cards into hand Hold R to shuffle the deck.

Left Click to throw cards, hold for more power!

Wander the land find power mythical elemental crystal creatures, defeat turrets in a bullet hell fashion and strategically shoot down the giant bosses. Target their crystal weak spot!

Cards are 5 types, water, ice, earth, fire, and air

The cards counter certain types giving multiplied damage!

Defeat all 5 elemental bosses!
